short_description.en: Rebate of 80% of project cost for air sealing and/or insulation, up to $8,000. Available for low-income residents.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

short_description.en: $2,000 rebate for new battery electric vehicles.

contractor_restrictions: Buy from a participating EV dealership
other_restrictions: Electric vehicle price can be no more than $80,000 for eligible pickup trucks or commercial vans or $55,000 for other eligible new vehicles.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

other_restrictions: Electric vehicle price can be no more than $80,000 for eligible pickup trucks or commercial vans or $55,000 for other eligible new vehicles.
stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

other_restrictions: Vehicle's final purchase price must be no more than $40,000.

short_description.en: $75 instant discount for an ECM circulator pump through participating distributors.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

short_description.en: $50 rebate for ENERGY STAR certified clothes washers.

stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

short_description.en: Rebate for 1/3 of project cost for a geothermal heat pump, up to $3,000.

other_restrictions: Lifetime limit of one geothermal rebate per housing unit
stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

short_description.en: Rebate for 80% of project cost for a heat pump, up to $8,000. Available for low income residents.

equipment_capacity_restrictions: Sized for at least 80% of home's peak heating load
stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.

short_description.en: Up to 85% of the cost of ducted heat pump systems for manufactured (mobile) homes. Available for low-income households. $2,000 co-pay.

equipment_capacity_restrictions: Whole-home heat pump that uses the home's existing ductwork
stacking_details: Can be stacked with federal tax credits.
